#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	int T;
	unsigned long long N, M, p, q;
	scanf("%d", &T);
	while(T--) {
		scanf("%llu %llu", &N, &M);
		p = q = 1;
		--N;
		while(N--) {
			p += q;
			q += p;
			if(p >= M)
				p %= M;
			if(q >= M)
				q %= M;
		}
		
		printf("%llu/%llu\n", p, q);
	}

}
